targets.query: SELECT mean("usage_user") + mean("usage_system") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("application" = 'knol-broker') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host"
SELECT mean("usage_user") + mean("usage_system") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("application" = 'knol-broker') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host"
SELECT 1- mean("Value") FROM "SocketServer" WHERE ("name" = 'NetworkProcessorAvgIdlePercent') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname"
SELECT 1- mean("Value") FROM "SocketServer" WHERE ("name" = 'NetworkProcessorAvgIdlePercent') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname"
SELECT mean("OneMinuteRate") FROM "RequestHandlerAvgIdlePercent" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "hostname"
SELECT mean("OneMinuteRate") FROM "RequestHandlerAvgIdlePercent" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "hostname"

SELECT sum("OneMinuteRate") FROM "BrokerTopicMetrics" WHERE ("name" = 'FailedProduceRequestsPerSec') AND $timeFilter AND "OneMinuteRate" > 0.01 and topic !~ /_confluent.*/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname", "topic" fill(null)
SELECT sum("OneMinuteRate") FROM "BrokerTopicMetrics" WHERE ("name" = 'TotalProduceRequestsPerSec') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "hostname"
SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "autogen"."disk" WHERE ("application" = 'knol-broker' AND "device" != 'xvda1' AND "device" != 'xvdh') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "autogen"."disk" WHERE ("application" = 'knol-broker' AND "device" != 'xvda1' AND "device" != 'xvdh') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "autogen"."disk" WHERE ("application" = 'knol-broker' AND "device" != 'xvda1' AND "device" != 'xvdh') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device", "host"

SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used_percent" FROM "autogen"."disk" WHERE ("application" = 'knol-broker' AND "device" != 'xvda1' AND "device" != 'xvdh') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device", "host"
